HelpTooltip:
ABOUT 
 Extracts and Outputs the position from a Game Object. GameObject Data In port connects to a GameObject node Data Out port. Live Data Out port connects to aDataType, Velocity, Record Examples and Machine Learning System nodes.Local space is only applicable if the GameObject is a child of another object.
PortTooltip: Connect to Data In port. Outputs a Vector3

tips: x, y and z position values: turn on/off using the toggle, flashes when detecting input
check the box to use local space values
